reviews.title: Very nice. Definitely recommend
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful. Slightly taller than the home decor 3 handled vase. The finish is smooth and has a slight sheen (not matte no matter what the description said) on this better homes %26 garden vase. I have them on different display shelves and they look nice without being matchy matchy.

reviews.title: Love the texture!!
reviews.review_text: I recently added the Better Homes %26 Gardens 9.8” White Handled Ceramic Vase to my formal dining table, and it's such a beautiful piece. The texture and matte white color give it a clean, elegant look that fits perfectly with my decor. It looks much more high-end than the price suggests! I especially love the subtle detailing and the handles — they give the vase a timeless, slightly rustic feel that works in both modern and traditional settings. My only wish is that it came in a larger size, especially for use as a centerpiece on bigger tables. Still, it's a lovely accent piece and a great value. I'd definitely buy it again or grab another if they release a taller version.
I Love the vase very much. The color and height goes well with my other decorations on top of my dresser. It can go alone or with some twigs or flower arrangements.

reviews.title: A very nice vase
reviews.review_text: Very nice vase or display piece. Rivals a $60 vase I had my eye on. Not quite as large as I had hoped, but it will do the trick the finishes a little brighter than expected.

reviews.title: Beautiful white vase
reviews.review_text: Love this vase. I bought it to put in a new arched cabinet I also bought from Walmart. Walmart has been bringing it lately
Super happy with this vase! Smooth finish and looks much more expensive than it is

reviews.title: very disappointing
reviews.review_text: its a very nice, unfortunately I can't seem to get it delivered in one piece. The original order arrived broken, no surprise since it was only wrapped in a piece of paper inside a huge box with other items. Walmart sends a replacement - this one arrived in a million pieces. Also just wrapped in a piece of paper inside the box. Very disappointing as it really is a very nice vase. It's not carried at my local Walmart so I guess I'll look for something similar elsewhere, I give up on having it shipped.
Broken in 1 million pieces put in a large box with no bubble wrap. Although Walmart did give me my refund, I was disappointed it didn't get wrapped better.

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.review_text: Vase was completely broken when I opened the box. There was nothing inside the box to protect the glass vase from breaking.
I just opened the box and the way that was packaged didn't protect the vase , and of course is totally broken, shame
Shipped in a box with no padding. came cracked in 2

reviews.title: 100% recommending
reviews.review_text: Worth the money . Elegant design and beautiful piece.

reviews.title: Restoration Hardware and Pottery Barn look for les
reviews.review_text: High level designer look. Arrived in perfect condition.

reviews.title: Great quality
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a classy aesthetic base, and I found one affordable and a great quality

reviews.title: Good size vase for fall flowers.
reviews.review_text: Good size for flower arrangement.

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.review_text: Love the style! It's perfect for year round design! 🩷

reviews.title: Came shattered
reviews.review_text: Came shattered. Don't even attempt to purchase online. There was nothing but a plastic bag around it.

reviews.title: Absolutely love it, beautiful and quality
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Really nice sleek and strong design. Really well made, doesn't look at or feel at all cheap. Has a good weight for the size and fits perfectly on my hutch in my dining area. Planning on adding some eucalyptus to it

reviews.title: Perfect decor piece!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love how sturdy this vase is and the multiple handle design. It has enough room inside to fit multiple types of flowers and deep enough to hold enough water. The white color is very elegant and stands out in any room. It is easy to clean and stores upright in any cabinet. It is a unique design that definitely added a unique touch to my kitchen dining area.

reviews.title: Versatile style and amazing quality
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The vase is beautiful and an amazing quality product. The design is so versatile and could be designed to go with modern or farmhouse rustic styles with the addition of some flowers and leaves inside. The size is great to fit on any table or even a fireplace mantel.

reviews.title: Beautifully Crafted Vase
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This vase is so beautiful! I was surprised at how heavy this weighed - it felt like a luxurious home decor item. The texture is of this feels like a handmade ceramic product with little bumps and edges that give it a character. This would need a lot of flowers to make it look full as the mouth of this is pretty wide. This stands at a nice height of 10 inches and would make a pretty piece in the middle of a dining table or as a living room decor on a table. I also like this isn't straight up white, but more of an ivory color, which fits my house neutral color aesthetic.

reviews.title: 3 handle vase
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product free from Influenster for my honest opinion. I received the Bettrr Homes & Gardens 9.8" White handled Ceramic Vase. I love how sturdy this is. It has a nice textured finish. The three handles come in handy when you have a full vase.

reviews.title: The perfect entryway staple!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The perfect vase for our entryway! I can't wait to fill it with the perfect greenery. In love with the simplicity of it. It came packaged perfectly, so there were no knicks/ cracks. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Elegant and Versatile a stunning statement Vase
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was gifted the Better Homes & Gardens 3-Handle White Vase by Better Homes & Gardens and an influencer,in exchange for my honest opinion,and I must say I am so impressed! The design is simple yet striking, with the three-handle detail adding a unique, sculptural touch. The matte white finish makes it super versatile—it just fits seamlessly into any decor style, whether modern, boho, or classic. It's the perfect size for fresh or dried flowers, but honestly, it's a statement piece on its own. The quality is excellent, and it feels much more expensive than it is. Such a beautiful addition to my home!

reviews.title: Stunning!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Absolutely stunning vase! It feels very high quality and I love that there's non slips on the bottom so the vase won't slide around. It will look beautiful with or without flowers in it too!

reviews.title: Simple and lovely
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This vase is sturdy and think. It looks good on its own or with a floral arrangement. I really like the grip pads on the bottom that help it not to move on smooth surfaces.

reviews.title: basic home necessity
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] it's made exactly like the image, with flowers in it or even painted i think it can add a nice touch to home. it's pretty true to size- though i won't be pulling out a ruler to double check.

reviews.title: Large and in tact
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love this vase so much! It is very thick and sturdy. It came in in one piece and a very safe packaging. It's quite large, can fit a lot of flowers. very modern and chic.

reviews.title: Quality of this product is amazing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is such a beautiful Vase. I purchased some beautiful silk flowers to put in it and making a pretty arrangement for my mom...Thank you for the opportunity
